name: Pre-admit Patient
description: Pre-admission notification sent when a patient undergoes the pre-admission process in preparation for a future visit or stay
businessPurpose: Notify receiving applications that episode-related data has been collected in preparation for a patient's upcoming visit or admission
timing: Sent during pre-admission process before actual patient arrival

generationRules.requiredDataQuality: Medium - pre-admission data collection may be incomplete pending actual arrival
